name: Dragon Souls: the path of sacrifices
name_original: Dragon Souls: the path of sacrifices
description:
Hey! This is my    Second videogame, made in a week for the SHMUP JAM.

You're a dragon with serious ambitions and your parents won't help you financially, so you found another solution. Now you must survive the consequences!

Controls:

You'll get a new special attack everytime a new boss finds you!

Movement: W,A,S,D or left stick.

Normal attack: mouse left click, cross and square on ps4 controller, A and X on XBOX controller.

Special Attack: mouse right click, triangle and circle on ps4 controller, Y and B on XBOX controller.
